author: {'steamid': '76561198113534595', 'num_games_owned': 424, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 5121, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4307, 'last_played': 1709021994}
review: Epic Battle Fantasy 4 is a fantastic, light hearted, and self aware RPG, and it is very cheap. I highly reccomend you pick it up at your earliest convenience.

author: {'steamid': '76561198071618508', 'num_games_owned': 1987, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 1615, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1615, 'last_played': 1544973129}
review: The Epic Battle Fantasy series may be only one of three franchises that has seen continued success after it left its browser form. Along with the Creeper World and Bloons franchises, EBF has actually been purchased and allowed its developer some level of financial return on their years of work. At its core EBF is a simplistic RPG and is altogether rather repetitive, however the cute art style and writing full of references to bygone memes and some new ones is a refreshing take on the genre. I finally played through EBF4 after the release of EBF5 and one warning I have to give about this series is that they should not be played or replayed one after the other. You have to give yourself a month to refresh or else you're going to be bored, as each game in the series has its share of repetition, although that does not mean I recommend them any less.

author: {'steamid': '76561198090465698', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 132, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 132, 'last_played': 1527192521}
review: Hello! This is a game that's filled with stupid humor, fun boss fights (except that fucking plant one) and all sorts of cool secrets + content. If you're into games that are filled with "oh jesus christ why did I put this on the hardest difficulty" and "jesus christ this is so much fun" then you should probably play this. Otherwise, you have no taste.

author: {'steamid': '76561198105664591', 'num_games_owned': 180, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 9413, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6377, 'last_played': 1709175654}

author: {'steamid': '76561198171718019', 'num_games_owned': 164, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 7212, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6814, 'last_played': 1709097458}
review:
[h1]Epic Battle Fantasy 4[/h1]


Hace tiempo hice una reseña del EBF3 donde hare un pequeño resumen, cuando era niño o cuando yo estaba en la primaria, llegaba a casa a jugar EBF3 en una pagina de juegos flash llamado [url=https://armorgames.com/]Armorgames.com[/url]. 

Cuando yo aun no conocia steam me la pasaba jugando en esa pagina, y despues de buscar juegos nuevos me encontre EBF4 y me lo llegue a completar. Cuando ya conoci Steam, decidi buscar si ambos juegos estan en la plataforma, alli mire que el EBF3 esta gratis como en Steam y en flash, pero el EBF4 es de paga, pero en su version flash es gratis (la version de Steam o paga es porque añade mas contenido que la version flash). Aunque ya me lo habia completado en la version flash, decidi pagar para volverlo a jugar, pero esta vez en Steam.

A diferencia del EBF3, este juego es mas conocido que el anterior, tiene varios cambios como la calidad de los dibujos, puedes jugarlo gratis o puedes pagar para tener mas contenido (que si no recuerdo mal, añade lo que seria piezas de armas, armaduras, mas enemigos, bosses y una zona). Si te gustan los juegos de Rpg por turno, entonces compratelo cuando este en rebajas.

author: {'steamid': '76561198297414013', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 1628, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1628, 'last_played': 1544272893}
review:
I'm honestly just not enjoying this game.

It lacks controller support for no good reason... I understand it's a port of a flash game, but if you're going to port it, maybe make that little extra effort. This game is insufferable on a laptop with a touchpad, and I don't often have a place to use a mouse, so a controller would be ideal.

It throws a LOT at you right out of the box, including instant-death attacks very early on, keeping you constantly micro-managing your party's well being even in some trash fights.

It requires almost constant micro-management of gear, since the fights are often very mixed and resists/vulnerabilities need to be shuffled, but also penalizes you for swapping gear mid-fight.

Because of the above, even short farming or grinding fights are unnecessarily long, and fights against strong "trash" enemies like dragons take for-friggin-ever.

All in all, this game is mostly boring, with a regular stream of barely-funny trope references that I suppose are to make it... charming? You spend a lot of time doing a tedious amount of micro-management every few fights, or you'll quickly fall behind, and the game doesn't really do much to show you what you should be doing (upgrading gear, skills, specials, what the differences are, etc), so you'll just kind of suffer along.

Maybe this game would be more enjoyable if I'd been following the series, but, as a stand-alone, it's a let-down. I'm glad I got it on sale, but I still would rather have the money.

author: {'steamid': '76561198096919270', 'num_games_owned': 397, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 4175, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2890, 'last_played': 1683421338}
review:
Easily one of my favorite RPGs. Beautiful writing, beautiful characters, and beautiful artwork. The gameplay is good, comparable to the old Final Fantasy games, with a little more depth to the out-of-combat aspects, like weapon forging and equips. Also features all the common RPG tropes: block puzzles, backtracking, and semi-pointless NPC quests. The areas are interesting, although for the first third of the game, you just equip gear with the proper elemental resistance and you're good. At the second boss, though, the game steps it up and keeps you on your toes strategically. In terms of difficulty, Normal is a cake walk, and Epic is either a grindfest or a brain teaser, depending on your playstyle. I'd say that Hard is the way to go if you want a challenge with decent progression. All in all, though, I wouldn't say that's the main draw with the game (At least not for me personally). The best part of this game is the writing. Let's start with the characters. Each of the four characters has a distinct personality that, at a surface level, seems to fit into a common RPG trope. The dialogue between the party members, and the party members and the NPCs/world around them, is phenominal. Witty, crisp, and that elusive perfect amount of deviant, it keeps the game fresh and fun and keeps me wanting to see more of these vagabonds travelling the world, killing things and making wisecracks as they do. The story is interesting overall, but the game seems to lack focus on it.

Final score: 9/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198034666883', 'num_games_owned': 330, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 3819, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3819, 'last_played': 1439795382}
review: Love these sorts of RPG games

author: {'steamid': '76561198070363958', 'num_games_owned': 167, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2977, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2977, 'last_played': 1497986888}
review: Since EBF5 dropped i thought i might leave a review here. First of all, as a kid, i enjoyed playing EBF, EBF2 and EBF3 on my web browser and loved literally every second of it. Instead of being just a copycat that rips off popular games, these games managed to reference them in a way that made me smile every time i understood a reference and this one is no exception. The battle system is very well thought out, puzzles are sometimes hard, but not frustrating to solve. Overall the story is interesting, if you have played EBF3 and maybe even EBF2, especially because of the two Godcats. The music is fantastic, as well as the visuals not only in the overwold, but also in fights. I love this game and am looking forward to playing more of it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198088553474', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 1440, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1217, 'last_played': 1575262022}
review:
The game doesn't evolve too much from it's predicessors, but if it ain't broke, why fix it? Around the late game, where battles get much longer, it became A good game to play in the background while watching a livestream or movie. Plus you can run it on basically any PC as long as flash is supported.
Also, let me save you some time: Most of the negative reviews are from people who didn't read the game's description. What's in the description and trailers is what you get. Nothing less, and I wouldn't have it any other way.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056350187', 'num_games_owned': 139, 'num_reviews': 429, 'playtime_forever': 5552, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2033, 'last_played': 1710420951}
review:
Pros:
-I like the menu interface. Everything I need is right in front of me and it’s easy to get to with a click
-Anne is a good character, with some good healing and one target attacks and learns wind magic by default.
-Summons. While I didn’t use all of them, these can be game changers  in though fights. Or you can just summon Slime bunny and get the Regan status.
-I upgraded my equipment more often in this one and the effects are really something. I was dying a good few times during the second boss and the winter town’s optional boss and when I upgraded my equipment for the third boss, it was way easier. A party member died but it was easier.
-Speaking of bosses, the battle mountain has some pretty though and brutal bosses which are a joy to take down. Sure they start spamming helpers every turn near the end but I really enjoyed those fights.
I don’t hate fighting monoliths now.

Cons:
-I may have missed something but I wish there was a way to know what the elements symbols mean. I thought Light was wind for a good while.
-I had to go down to easy to fight the final boss. Even on easy these guys are not pushovers.
-Can get boring after a while.
9/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198140571756', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 5006, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4645, 'last_played': 1590102639}
review:
I think it could have used some more work.  I found the characters in the story undeveloped and difficult to relate to.  I'd give it a 4/10 at best.

Some character development would have been nice.  I  would have liked a decent love story.  Now we have to leave that to the fans, and I don't really trust them.

It all ended too soon!  I hope we can all go on more adventures some day!

author: {'steamid': '76561198807045104', 'num_games_owned': 105, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 6249, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3533, 'last_played': 1709268411}
review:
Epic Battle Fantasy 4 é um jogo RPG muito divertido de se jogar e por isso estou fazendo essa análise, irei falar sobre o porque você deve comprar esse jogo:

1-o jogo contém uma séries de desafios (desafios mais hardcores do que as do Zóio) que envolve matar bosses na dificuldade Épica o que faz com que algumas batalhas exiga muita extratégia para se vencelas, desafios perfeitos para pessoas TRUE HARDCORE GAMERS!!!!

2-PIADAS, sim, isso mesmo, o jogo contém piadinhas durante a gameplay,

3-Variedades de ataques normais e magicos desde uma pancada até uma desturição mundial entre outras...

4-Musicas ótimas, principalmentes as dos bosses, para se encaixar com a adrenalina no momento 

5-Armas, Armaduras e Acessórios, um ponto positivo e que nunca vi em outro jogo de RPG é que quando você a equipa ela aperece durante as batalhas e no mapa.

Bem essa foi minha análise, espero ter lhe convencido de ter a vontade de jogar esse game incrivel.

author: {'steamid': '76561198089719552', 'num_games_owned': 572, 'num_reviews': 215, 'playtime_forever': 538, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 538, 'last_played': 1542878588}
review:
Es un juego muy divertido y gracioso. Continúa la historia donde la dejó EBF3, y mete como nuevo personaje jugable a una arquera.

Contiene una gran variedad de armas y armaduras (divididas en arcos, espadas, báculos, armas de fuego, armaduras masculinas, armaduras femeninas e insignias) que se pueden mejorar para conseguir pasar esos monstruos que tanto cuesta vencer.

Otro detalle a destacar: contiene diálogos rompiendo la cuarta pared y comentarios graciosos. Y quizá lo mejor: traducido por completo al español.

author: {'steamid': '76561198003940864', 'num_games_owned': 465, 'num_reviews': 164, 'playtime_forever': 269, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 269, 'last_played': 1442237474}
review:
눈 여겨보고 있다가 샀던 게임이지만 너무 기대를 많이 했던 것 같다.
스팀에 올렸으면 웹 공개본이랑 다른 점이 있겠지 싶었는데 그런 점은 없었다.

플래시 기반이라 여러모로 불편한 점이 많고
쏟아지는 개그와 패러디도 몇 번 피식하다가 너무 많으니까 정색하는 수준.

RPG로써의 완성도는 그럭저럭.
퍼즐의 난이도는 약간 짜증날 정도.
등장인물들은 내내 나사 빠진 소리나 해대서 긴장감이 하나도 없다.
등장인물에 애착이 가지 않으니 레벨업을 해도 즐겁지가 않고 스토리에도 관심이 안간다.
덕분에 개그 취향이 맞지 않다면 그다지 즐길 거리가 없다.

게임이 나쁘다는 것은 아니다.
다만 이 게임이 별로 유명하지 않은데는 그에 걸맞는 이유가 있다.
오직 팬만을 위한 게임이기에 이 시리즈 팬이 아니라면 구매는 추천할 수 없다.
사고 싶다면 먼저 웹에 올라온 플래시 판을 해본 다음 다시 생각해보는 것이 어떨까.

https://www.kongregate.com/games/kupo707/epic-battle-fantasy-4

나로써는 4시간 이상 붙잡고 있을만한 동기부여가 전혀 되지 않는 게임이었다.
이 게임을 10분 붙잡고 있는 것보다 실비 머리를 1시간 쓰다듬는 것이 더 즐거운 것은 왜 일까.

review:
I played this game when it was free and hosted on a popular flash game site.  We all know the one, no need to mention it.  When I saw the game on Steam, I immediately purchased it as support for Matt.  His stuff has always been great, funny and with excellent game play.  
I purchased it for my son as well and he had a blast.  If you are looking for a fun story, good game play and witty banter between your party members, go for this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198072169113', 'num_games_owned': 386, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 1996, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1614, 'last_played': 1650647746}
review: An absolute gem of a JRPG, the only one I actually like (mostly because it's a bit of a piss-take). Admittedly, I do have the nostalgia goggles on, seeing as how I played both EBF games prior to their release on steam, but it's still gets laughs out of me, just like when I first played it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198253534355', 'num_games_owned': 325, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 1900, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1773, 'last_played': 1540695325}
review: I haven’t played that many RPGs in the past, but this game is very fun! There’s a lot of freedom of strategy in this game, there’s a lot of equipment and weapons to use, and some spells you get to pick who learns them, leading to lots of different strategies that you can use. I highly recommend playing the game on epic difficulty unless you are very new to RPGs and strategies in general, because I think the other difficulties ended up being too easy and essentially just being a game of hitting an enemy until it dies. However epic difficulty I feel is the best way to play, because it means you are forced to use more of the mechanics like switching team members or equipment sets or using various buffs and debuffs without being so hard as to be overwhelming. If you are interested in this game I also highly recommend EBF5 which I feel is an improvement of every aspect of this game (don't worry about missing story either, as 5 is a sort of reboot)

author: {'steamid': '76561198271888115', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 2089, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2086, 'last_played': 1584521857}
review: Never have I seen a game where you summon mammoths, tanks, and sword wielding kittens all at the same time. The sheer nonsense that goes on during combat is truly astonishing. You will see hilarious commentary, and tons of game references when you travel with this cast of muscle headed idiots. This is a great game to play and play again in my opinion there is a lot of hidden treasure for you to discover and a bunch of hilarious achievements to unlock, truly a great game.

review: The best game that i played.When i didin't have the gaming pc that i have now i used to play it in browser and when i finded out it was on steam to i was very ecxited about this.Matt kep up the great work of EBF5(The best game that i played better than the others for exapmle The Long Dark is worser than EBF5 and EBF5 is better than The Long Dark)(PS Idon't want to offend the tld or ebf player that was an example)

author: {'steamid': '76561198051007182', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 4118, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1241, 'last_played': 1612777864}
review:
This is one of my favorite RPGs.  The game is charming, hilarious, provides plenty of play time, and has very satisfying and strategic combat.  I grew up playing the classic 'Final Fantasy' titles, and I find this game to be more enjoyable.  In this game, the gear is all useful and plays into strategy and style of play, and you can't rely on equipment and XP level alone to sorely outmuscle your opponents as in a lot of RPGs.  You can also play it one handed with a mouse, which can be really useful if you like to do other things while you play games.  When my wife was pregnant and had sore feet, I could rub her feet with the hand I wasn't using.

Believe the scores of reviews; this is a great game.  Support the dev so he can afford to keep it up.

author: {'steamid': '76561198192980079', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 11728, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2277, 'last_played': 1703991834}
review:
This is a game that a casual, or the super hardcore can play.  The combat is probably the best most in-depth system in any turn based battle game ever (Disclaimer:  I have not played every turn based game ever).  I played this game on normal the first time (enemies have 100% hp and attack).  It was challenging and fun.  Then I played on the hardest difficulty (200% enemy hp and attack) and had only marginally more trouble.  This is because there are, say, 10 mechanics (random number) that are important to understand to improve your game.  To win of normal, you need to understand 2 of them (I should get fire defense against fire enemies and attack them with water).  Harder difficulties just make it so you have to start using buffs and statuses that you could ignored on normal.  My latest playthrough (first on on the steam version) I am playing on Epic without killing any enemy twice (no grinding) and just beat the Rafflesia while under leveled by an average of 2 levels.  So while the game is extremely complex and has an absurd skill ceiling, but you can just kinda ignore that complexity and have fun too.  That is the core of the game.  Additionally, the art style is fantastic, the animations are fluid, and the story and quests provide comic relief.

However, this is an indie game, and while the living God who made it pretty much by himself is incredable, the game does not even support 1920 by 1080.  I have a 4k monitor.  Since stretching sub HD to 4k is a bit of a strain on my processor (4 cores 3.4 hz), to play in full screen without lag, I need to turn the settings down to nothing.  So if you have a 4k monitor, be warned.  HD you will be fine though.  Unlike Epic Battle Fantasy 3 (which is free on Steam and will give you an idea of what this game is like), there is a lot of back tracking, and there are no acheivements for getting all the treasure in an area, so you may end up missing some equipment.  If you have OCD like me, this is bothersome.

Despite all of this, I regret nothing, and you won't either.

author: {'steamid': '76561198138275870', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 105, 'playtime_forever': 1081, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1080, 'last_played': 1543693962}

author: {'steamid': '76561198171150098', 'num_games_owned': 25, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 3111, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3078, 'last_played': 1536764806}

Decisamente consigliato, come gli altri capitoli della serie.

review: If you are a fan of jrpgs and used to spend a lot of time on Newgrounds and Kongregate you probably already played this. if you have, buy it anyway to support the dev. If you have not played it and you like jrpgs you are going to have a good time.

author: {'steamid': '76561198167775366', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 89, 'playtime_forever': 3539, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3472, 'last_played': 1710216960}
review: Epic battle fantasy 4 is one of those games that it’s hard to explain why it’s so good. It might be because it’s like final fantasy mixed with the ridiculousness you only see from the internet. It might be because it has a thoroughly thought out story with interesting and likeable characters. But it’s probably because people who played the old games when they were free on the internet were completely blown away by the improvements made in this installation. Definitely try it out if you like RPG games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198197447627', 'num_games_owned': 111, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 2231, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2228, 'last_played': 1556726726}
review: Real talk. This game was one of my all time favorites from my childhood, and the series as a whole was what drew me into the world of video game music and games in general. The entire series has had some of the best music to listen to, and watching the endless interactions between characters still brings a smile to my face to this day. I would seriously recommend this to anyone that is a fan of RPGs.

author: {'steamid': '76561198072882121', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 2408, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2271, 'last_played': 1471346296}

The optional area this adds is great because it scales with your level so you can experience it when ever you want without worrying about powercreeping too much for it to be a challenge

author: {'steamid': '76561198066237823', 'num_games_owned': 220, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 4160, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4149, 'last_played': 1625227135}

author: {'steamid': '76561198281523843', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1718, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1676, 'last_played': 1541863225}
review: i played it as a flash game and im still playing it now. epic battle fantasy 4 is not only a well balanced and well made game, but it somehow manages to make half the heroes complete jerks while still making them likable. if you're here from the free version, i can confirm the added content makes it worth buying. one of the best rpgs i know, and its honestly what drew me to steam in the first place.

author: {'steamid': '76561198189476526', 'num_games_owned': 91, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 7726, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6723, 'last_played': 1543435754}
review:
Very solid RPG, with many hours worth of content (My playtime is from completely 100%ing it and a bit more, but just beating it on lower difficulties should take at least 10-15  hours?) and difficulties that enable both experienced RPG players and those new to the genre to enjoy. 
The characters don't really take themselves seriously, and -whilst some jokes are quite dated at this point-, they're enjoyable to see interact with the situation and each other.
Enviroments and the enemies they host are fun to explore and varied, requiring different equips and smart tactics to deal with effectively on harder settings.
New weapons, armour and flairs are fun to find and try out their effects.

Overall, a very enjoyable experience worth the price of admission in my opinion.
You CAN find the game for free in flash form online, but the steam version has no ads, gives you more bosses to beat, equipment to find and medals to earn etc.

If you're unsure if you'd have a good experience or are hesitant to shell out money for an expansion of a flash game, I think it's worth waiting for a sale- I think it goes quite cheap at Christmas. A few pounds/dollars/whatever is a steal for the amount of content available.

I really love this series; can't wait for the fifth game to come out!

author: {'steamid': '76561198084952965', 'num_games_owned': 81, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 4149, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3193, 'last_played': 1569029718}
review:
(No me considero particularmente bueno para escribir reseñas, pero con tal de apoyar al autor del juego, me tiraré a la piscina pese a ello)

¡Bueno, personalmente me fascinó el juego! Primero jugué los EBF 1, 2 y 3 cuando ya habían salido, y me dejaron enganchadísimo con la libertad que me dan de jugar, poder mejorar a mis personajes, ¡y a [b] cada una de las armas y armaduras! [/b] ¿Puedes creer eso?

EBF4 sigue un poco lo mismo del 3 (que fue el primero en que pasó de oleadas de batalla, a ya tener un mapa y una historia a la RPG tradicional), pero básicamente más grande, más bonito, y mejor :D con un personaje nuevo y todo! El humor también es increíble, así que eso por sí mismo debiera incitarte a jugarlo y encantarte con el juego :)

Definitivamente lo recomiendo, y de hecho es tan bueno que se lo compré a mi mejor amiga, y me agradeció y todo y quedó prendada con el juego :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198803827801', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 5950, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3573, 'last_played': 1641414584}
review: These games really WERE my childhood and this is the first game I ever bought, really worth it. review: Awesome game that is actually a lot more detailed than it looks at first glance, would definitely recommend and if your not sure about it try out the first and second on kongregate and the third for free on steam.

author: {'steamid': '76561198260835437', 'num_games_owned': 151, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 4451, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4184, 'last_played': 1562706140}
review:
I'm gonna start off by saying that I absolutely love this game and all the other games in this series. The epic battle fantasy 2 was one of the first games I ever played, all those years ago when even flash games were impressive. From then on I followed the series and loved every new addition to it. My journey capped off at this game, when I finally got enough money to buy the full version on steam. Even though I could play most of it for free online, I was not disappointed. The extra content and cloud saving was worth it. I was even more thrilled to learn that the surge of people playing this game on steam led to the developer starting work on a fifth game in the series. This game, and the other ones in the series, were my childhood, and I am proud to say that I have been following this series from the start.

Get this game. It's affordable, and it contains hours of content. I have beaten it many times over, both in the online flash version and on steam, and I still keep coming back every time I want to play a solid game with characters that I have grown to care about. 10/10. (the third game is free on steam, check that one out too, it is a good preview of the amazingness the fourth one is)

author: {'steamid': '76561198141594524', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 2419, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1657, 'last_played': 1671989304}
review:
First of all, keep in mind you can play a free version online. You won't get the extra area (which is honestly 1/3 of the game)
There is more than enough content for the price you get, hard but (mostly) fair, it looks great, there's a ton of skills and even more equips to change up the gameplay a bit and most importantly, the music is absolutely badass. 
I recommend playing on Epic for the main game as it makes you utilise the buffs, debuffs and status effects more, maybe turn it down (yes, you can change difficulty on the go). It's also not that hard if you fight every encounter in the game (there are no random ones)
Only gripes are that the area exclusive to this version is too hard at times for cheap reasons (enemies spamming limit breaks), the backup system is a bit janky because a character will be unbuffed, and making a bad choice in spreading stat boots and skills might mean wasting time grinding later.

author: {'steamid': '76561198075810096', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 5194, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5005, 'last_played': 1656187667}
review: Um dos melhores jogos que ja joguei. Muito bom o combate, historia bem detalhada e engraçada e muitas coisas para fazer. Um desafio interessante para quem curte batalhas em turnos.

author: {'steamid': '76561198268977086', 'num_games_owned': 230, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1918, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1918, 'last_played': 1528394581}
review:
S'pretty good. 

What, more? Fine, it's got a nice, fun sense of humor, and deep turn-based JRPG combat with a whole lot of different options and plenty of goodies to find. I don't have much to say, really. There's certainly much worse ways to spend twelve dollars.

author: {'steamid': '76561198162152227', 'num_games_owned': 127, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 5068, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 34, 'playtime_at_review': 1892, 'last_played': 1711771558}
review: While not particularly innovative, to me it feels like this game understands what makes JRPGs and turn based combat fun to play. If you like unleashing giant monsters and over the top special attacks against wildlife animals minding their own business then this is the game for you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037765971', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 4013, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3191, 'last_played': 1553940490}
review: All this game are simply great.

author: {'steamid': '76561198148444410', 'num_games_owned': 52, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 3396, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3396, 'last_played': 1531931035}
review:
This game is a journey about 4 wildly different dudes that must find in them the power to prevent a terrible catastrophy and save the world, blablabla, you've heard it all before, it's your typical JRPG backstory, and will almost certainly not be the reason you will love this game. 
You will love this game because this is NOT your typical JRPG. The game is oozing with personality, be it in the art or in the dialogue, in the characters and in the foes, wherever you look, there is something special about it. Combat mechanics are simple and fun, and very naratively apropriate considering the fact the game does not take itself very seriously. But even on top of all that, it still presents a nice little bit of challenge on it's boss fights, specially on the extra bosses in the side content, if you chose to play on harder difficulties. And just to top it off, a phenomenal soundtrack to accompany all the epic moments you are going to have here.
Definitely an easy buy for anyone looking for some old school turn based RPG action

author: {'steamid': '76561198081436529', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 1004, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1004, 'last_played': 1453608073}
review: One of those games you can play over and over again, plenty of content and youre always looking forward to the next fight and gear upgrade, you constantly feel like your making progress and every step adds up to make your characters stronger and more defined in their roles

author: {'steamid': '76561198353215065', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1482, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1094, 'last_played': 1519071685}
review:
Since Matt so politely asked us to make a review of this game on Facebook, I'll kindly obliged.
The game itself is what you'd expect from a turn base RPG system with some quirks and mechanics with the summon and SP function. The game is overall enjoyable with some tid bits of easter eggs, jokes and references and is an overall enjoyable experience as you go along with the story of the four quirky dorks and their adventure to defeat some kind of cat or whatever.

author: {'steamid': '76561198067959547', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 3617, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3218, 'last_played': 1701671518}
review:
I very much enjoyed this game. The gameplay is rewarding and the bosses well designed, although I never was able to beat the final boss on epic, the music is very nice, and the comedy, whilst not always successful, is entertaining more often than not. All in all, this is a very solid game, definitely worth its price tag. The free version has most of the features, but lacks the DLC area, which is probably the best designed and most fun area of the game. In particular, the Dark Bosses (which are DLC only) are a far more enjoyable fight than any of the vanilla battles. However, it may be wise to try the free version first before purchasing this game, or maybe try the third game which is always free and also on Steam.

I would recommend this game fairly strongly, rating it at maybe an 8/10. It's better than most games on this website, but it's not groundbreaking.

author: {'steamid': '76561198082352632', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 5199, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4020, 'last_played': 1710287144}
review: This was the game that got me into turn based RPGs.  The combat is interesting due to the amount of equips and elements available.  I really enjoy it and I have been replaying it recently because the 5th game is coming out soon.

author: {'steamid': '76561198083504604', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 7663, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6587, 'last_played': 1661988638}
review:
Do you remember the golden days of flash games? This game fully embodies exactly what that feeling was back then. 
A solid fantasy-RPG with genuine charm and crafted with a whole lot of love is Epic Battle Fantasy. 
One of it's best features is in the customization; multiple equipment, spells, and weapons change up how you play, changing it's multiple elemental properties, letting you decide which one to really focus on.
The animation is amazing, characters, environments, enemies, bosses, attacks, and even specials (especially Natalie) are all unique. There are achievements too, if you're into that.

Can't wait for the sequel, go buy this game!

author: {'steamid': '76561198109163558', 'num_games_owned': 701, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 2069, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2069, 'last_played': 1517201806}

author: {'steamid': '76561198299227963', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 2790, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1, 'playtime_at_review': 2783, 'last_played': 1711728947}
review:
Encore un jeu formidable de Matt Rozsak, définitivement ce type est un génie pour dev du rpg. L'humour est très absurde mais fonctionne super si vous êtes amateur du genre. Et dire que le 5 va sortir bientôt... (beta ouverte sur le site kupogames)
Un chef d'oeuvre, et la suite est encore meilleure. N'hésitez pas à checker les autres jeux de kupogames (bullet heaven 2 notamment pour les shmuppers)

author: {'steamid': '76561198141990653', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 5489, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4094, 'last_played': 1709288951}
review:
Este juego, hasta ahora es el mejor que ha sacado Matt a la venta, por lo que a mi respecta, es el mejor juego que he jugado.
Como en la proxima entrega de EBF van a meter a nolegs, propongo a Matt añadir a Phyrnna para EBF VI

author: {'steamid': '76561198024575881', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 8199, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8129, 'last_played': 1508173146}
review:
Kiedyś omijałem turowe RPG-i.

Było tak do momentu kiedy zagrałem w Epic Batlle Fantasy 3. Gra zachwyciła mnie przejrzystością zasad, animacjami, wysokiej jakości podkładem dźwiękowym i specyficznym humorem.

Wszystko to znajdziemy również w czwartej części wraz z nowymi wrogami, możliwością stawiania czoła wyzwaniu w opcjonalnej lokacji ze skalowaniem poziomów (Nie zapomnijcie ustawić poziomu trudności na EPIC!), czy jeszcze lepiej poprowadzoną, acz wciąż nieskomplikowaną fabułą.

Seria EBF przekonała mnie do turowych RPG-ów. Może przekona i Ciebie.

author: {'steamid': '76561198244427326', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 7224, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7101, 'last_played': 1529489636}
review: Kupo wanted me to do this. So I did.

author: {'steamid': '76561198093347752', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 19436, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14308, 'last_played': 1693245118}
review:
Definitely the best indie game I have ever played! Don’t be fooled by it being the fourth, you can play it first without having ever even heard of the others (I actually started on this one and went back to play all of Kupo's other games). I’ve sunk so many hours into this game both here and on Kongregate, smashing foes, claiming loot, and earning badges! It’s like a better, funnier, cuter, less grind-y version of traditional Final Fantasy. The humor is very tongue-in-cheek, poking lighthearted fun at stuff you see every day, either around you or in the news, and the art is an adorable anime-esque style you can't help but love. And there are. So. Many. Easter eggs. Easter eggs for days. And the text changes depending on who you have in the front!

The game is entirely planned, designed, written, and developed by one guy who has what makes games actually fun in mind, and with an ear turned to his fans. The music is done by Phyrnna, and is both catchy and fitting, while the sound effects are satisfying. And at only $12, now, it is a steal for some easy fun, plus you get the awesome soundtrack included! So get in there, beat up some adorable monsters, steal your way to riches, and make yourself the most morally gray and dysfunctional team of heroes around!

to;dr 100/10, would adventure again, and again, and again.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047433759', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1416, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1075, 'last_played': 1509316779}
review:
One of my favourite games. Bought it after playing the free version online a bunch, which you can try first if you're not certain of buying. Buying gives you extra content which isn't canon, but is very fun. (You have to replay the story mode if you want to access the extra content though).
The main two pluspoints of this game are 
+ its absolutely solid turnbased gameplay paired with a fun equipment-system
+ the humorous, pop/internet-culture referencing dialogue

Something that I personally liked less than its predecessor ebf3, is the pacing of walking through the overworld: that part is quite a bit slower. Also, just a heads up, though I think it works well for the game: for an RPG, its story isn't actually a very strong focus point.

I absolutely recommend anyone remotely interested try this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198061519611', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 146, 'playtime_forever': 3754, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3754, 'last_played': 1538674579}
review: Epic Battle Fantasy 4 shows that turn based RPGs can still work. No "mash the attack button" in this game and each battle takes some strategy by focusing on enemy weaknesses. There isn't much of a story at all and the ending is kind of lame, but the battle system made up for the shortfalls. This game takes about 30 hours to "do everything" on your first playthrough. To get all the achievements you need to play the game 3 times which does get a bit repetitive, but the later playthroughs are faster since you already have all your gear.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041481282', 'num_games_owned': 167, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 3784, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3658, 'last_played': 1612525513}
review:
Simpel und doch sehr Schwer, es hat mich über 40h gekostet das Spiel durchzuspielen 
(Weil ich den Final Boss nicht ohne den Battle mountain loot geschafft hab)
aber es hat dennoch Spaß gemacht.
als Großer Fan des 3ten Teils fand ich es einfach Wunderbar die Alte Truppe wieder zu sehen und auch noch einen neuen Kameraden. Die "Cutscenes" waren zwar keine bewegenden Bilder aber dennoch sehr schön anzusehen.

Leider ist es sehr einseitig wenn man überlegt, man spammt 5min lang die Selben attacken um voran zu kommen.
und es tötet dich jeder Gegner in 1nem Hit (NUR AUF EPIC) was ab und an sehr frustriert wenn ich zb. 30-40min gegen einen Boss Kämpfe.

Dennoch hat es mir Spaß gemacht, und ich bereue keine Sekunde die Ich in EBF 4 verbrachte
9/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198139838690', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2101, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1787, 'last_played': 1527949235}
review:
最早是在国内某小游戏网站上玩到的2代盗版，距今已经有非常长的时间了。
之后的3代4代也都有玩过不下5遍，国内的汉化给我留下了很深的印象，怎么会有如此混沌邪恶的主角团2333
说起来下steam的初衷就是为以撒补票，为这款给我留下深刻影响的游戏补票也是理所应当的。
虽然啃正版生肉真的很累。。。
至于我为何要现在才发评论，那当然是因为5马上就要出了！
作者已经完成了95%以上，正在处理翻译的相关工作。且已经确认支持简/繁中语言。
steam也已经有5代的商店页面了，出来就买爆。
shut up and take my money！

author: {'steamid': '76561198062231717', 'num_games_owned': 2788, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 2888, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2483, 'last_played': 1568498838}
review:
Review zu "Epic Battle Fantasy 4"


Gespielte Zeit über 44 Stunden , weil ich alles mache was geht , und einige zusätzliche Sachen eine Herausforderung sind , und Spiel abgeschlossen auf Normal von Anfang an bis Ende , ein paar Erfolge sind noch übrig die kommen auch noch.


Eine Erklärung zur Nummer im Namen , sah das Spiel "Epic Battle Fantasy 4" in Steam gefiel mir gut aber ich Kaufe alles nur mit Rabatt nicht jeder ist reich und kann alles immer zu Vollpreis Kaufen , dann kam es irgend wann mal in einen Bundle wo dieses und auch andere Spiele noch waren , und Kaufte das Bundle , fing mit Spielen an , bevor ich am Ende ankam sah ich noch nach gibt es den noch einen Vorgänger da es immer wieder mal was so angedeutet wurde das da noch ein Teil davor geben könnte , und ja es gibt noch einen aber mit 3 im Namen , also und das Spiel gefällt mir auch , und wo ist 1 und 2 und dann fiel mir auf in 3 sind 3 Charakter und in 4 genau diese Zahl auch an Charakter , und jetzt wo es 5 im Namen gibt wo es 5 Charakter gibt ist es klar die Zahl bezieht sich rein auf die Charakter.

Also spart man sich Zeit um nach 1 und 2 zu suchen was es wohl nicht gibt , falls doch dann wohl nie erschienen.

"Epic Battle Fantasy 3" , "Epic Battle Fantasy 4" , "Epic Battle Fantasy 5"

---

Es ist bei dieses Spiel im Gegensatz zu anderen eher schwer zu Schreiben wie gut oder schlecht etwas ist , bisher viel mir so eigentlich nicht negatives auf , und es ist verständlicher für mich da es Deutsch gibt..

Aber man kann ja auch "Epic Battle Fantasy 3" mal Spielen , das auch Kostenlos ist , um zu sehen wie das einen gefällt , auch wenn es Englisch ist , wenn einen der Teil gefällt dann sollte einen "Epic Battle Fantasy 4" und "Epic Battle Fantasy 5" gefallen.

Also von mir her gefallen mir diese Spiele sehr Gut.

---

In dieser Gruppe https://steamcommunity.com/groups/hoi4deu findest du mehr gute Reviews von mir, dort könnt ihr mir auch Folgen, (Kuratorseite).

author: {'steamid': '76561198010894890', 'num_games_owned': 683, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 1416, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 872, 'last_played': 1547514406}
review:
I do enjoy this type of RPG but I've never really felt immersed in any game of this kind.
Surprisingly this silly, juvenile game, with a simple storyline and playful light-minded dialogue has a very unique charm.

I wouldn't be playing this any time soon, but since I'm on a potato laptop atm I figured I'd continue my playthrough. It's good.

I  wish some advanced spells had more interesting animation rather than just an increase in size in comparsion with the base spell.

review:
This game was everything I was searching for. Simple rpg where you can
- Upgrade your characters (no limit)
- Has healing abilities (i want to say sort of support role, but at the end they all do so much dmg haha)
- Adventure based, but not too crazily indepth.
- Good simple skills system
- Easy to follow story line

Amazing game, great replayability.
10/10 would recommend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198059481894', 'num_games_owned': 342, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 14794, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13900, 'last_played': 1538408582}
review: Sigo sosteniendo lo que vengo diciendo desde que tengo 15 años: este juego es uno de los mejores que jugué durante mi infancia. He visto como la saga fue evolucionando desde sus inicios en flash de Newgrounds y quedé enganchadísimo. No es ambicioso, juega con la cuarta pared y tiene diálogos cómicos más que para aportar a una trama. Estoy ansioso por una 5ta entrega y que de una condenada vez Matt y Natz formalicen! Único punto en contra: lo agobiante que se vuelve completarlo al 100% (Sobretodo ese maldito logro de los 30M de daño!).

author: {'steamid': '76561198319027490', 'num_games_owned': 161, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1634, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 991, 'last_played': 1619812967}
review:
一根筋，勇敢，幽默单纯的Matt（快说偷了几把剑！）
时而严肃时而显得有趣的Lance（你这军火狂怎么这么好色！）
羞涩，善良有爱心的Natalie（有时候为了全成就不得不左键欧派真是抱歉啦）
天然呆，正义活泼的Anna（小傻子跟我回家啦！）
当然没有忘了可爱的NO Legs啦
四代的剧情和对话都相比前代丰富了不少，UI亦然
属性相克更加直观，新增了更强的解谜因素
角色特点性格等塑造更是有了很大的提升，在战斗时的对话和画风突变的过场CG里表现的淋淋尽致
要是你喜欢回合制RPG，这绝对是值得入手的佳作
一旦你喜欢上这个画风，你就肯定会开始系列通关了

“要不要，看看我的枪？”

author: {'steamid': '76561198162368960', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 94, 'playtime_forever': 1230, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1230, 'last_played': 1537343063}
review:
¿Buscas un juego verdaderamente difícil, en donde cada batalla sea un reto por sí misma, lleno de secretos, armas, crafting, habilidades y bosses que te pondrán a sudar? Estás en el lugar correcto.
Que no te engañe su aspecto de juego Flash: es un RPG en toda regla, adictivo, divertido y con mucho, mucho reto. Tiene una innumerable cantidad de objetos coleccionables, entre armas, medallas, ítems de stats, etc. 
Es un típico juego de combates por turnos, en donde el tipo elemental es crucial, tienes a una ranger, un tanque, una healer etc. Nada muy nuevo en ese aspecto, las armas y armaduras se forjan, usas AP para subir habilidades y todo eso. 
La dificultad nunca es injusta, no te hace rabiar ni nada, y no son batallas realmente azarosas: si pierdes, es culpa tuya. 
El juego es una parodia de los RPG convencionales, lleno de referencias a la cultura popular y easter eggs, rompiendo todo el rato la cuarta pared y con diseños de personajes graciosamente ridículos y kawaii. De hecho todo en el juego intenta ser ridículo: invocas a un gato llamado Sin Patas, usas Lays y Monsters para subir tus stats y el HP, atacas con una guitarra Gibson, puedes usar una tr*fuerza y un p*kachu... 
Todo el ambiente paródico no le quita la buena jugabilidad y el continuo reto que representa el juego, más si lo intentas en dificultades avanzadas. Dale una oportunidad.


Pros: 
-Mucho reto y mucha estrategia en cada batalla.
-Crafting, habilidades, muchas armas y armaduras. 
-Batallas opcionales (no encuentros aleatorios).
-Diseños muy lindos y requisitos mínimos para jugarlo.
-Mundos temáticos. 
-Aprox. 20 horas de juego, que por el precio no está mal.
-Post-game.
-El boss final no te va a decepcionar. Está tremendo.
-Juego en español, un español absolutamente neutro y sin regionalismos de España (¡uf!).

Cons:
-A veces el humor es un poco bobo/cliché (los personajes intentan emular al otaku estereotípico).
-Mucho diálogo basado en chistes sexistas (excesivo humor de pechos, Natz es sólo un fanservice sexoso, etc), aunque un pelo más moderado que EBF3.
-Misiones que consisten en llevarle a un NPC ciertos objetos y ya.
-Historia más bien absurda. 


PD. Es el "4", pero honestamente no necesitas haber jugado ninguno de los anteriores (éste también fue mi primer EPF), le pescas enseguida el rollo e igual tampoco es que tenga un amplio lore.

author: {'steamid': '76561198124256299', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 5177, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3630, 'last_played': 1585623031}
review:
Are you tired of RPGs taking themselves too seriously? Are you tired of so many over-the-top designs and intense artwork for everything? Are you in the mood for a game that makes you feel like a kid again because of all its humor, its art style, and general feel? Do you want to play an RPG game where the battle mechanics work really well, and upgrading equipment and special moves and such isn't too much of a hassle? How about an RPG with a well designed overworld filled with enemies, beatiful assets and puzzles.  How about a brilliant extra area to test your skills and such after you've progressed through the game a bit?  Or better yet, how about tons of equipment and attacks that reference some other nice games out there?
Or do you wanna just stare at the wizard's boobs the entire game?  I don't judge.
If you've answered yes to a couple of these questions, this game is for you.
Brilliant music, a fair price, a lovely art style, and honestly there's quite a bit of replay value with the multiple difficulty settings, allocation of specials, the extras area...so on and so forth.
Also the characters in this game are so damn hilarious.  Trust me, unless you're a speed runner, you won't wanna skip a single cutscene, or bit of dialouge.  Unless you've already seen it a hundred times.
And if you can't be bothered to care about all that, there are two girls in the game you can play dress up with.  Make em cowgirls, nuns, whatever the game gives you.  There's also two guys for that as well, if you're into that sort of thing.
10/10 I love this game.  And I will probably love the 5th game two.  So...stop reading this review and buy the game already.

author: {'steamid': '76561198015890349', 'num_games_owned': 68, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 3803, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1628, 'last_played': 1546728491}
review: Matt Roszak's latest creation, so far. But EBF5 is on the way. It's promising on it's trailer, just as how great EBF4 has become years ago. I like the series eversince I played it's first game online on a random flash game website around 2010. Rich in humour and adventure. It has a complete story with Matt and Natalie at the beginning of the franchise. The monsters and bosses are really challenging depending on what difficulty you play. Additionally, the franchise gets new characters, equips, items, skills on each new episode of the series. It has the cute, creative, cartoonish factor and some unbelievably odd pets like No Legs which is unique to the game and it's genre. I recommend you to at least, support the developer with payment for what he provided to all of us till now. The price of this product is natural and worth to buy.

author: {'steamid': '76561198847074624', 'num_games_owned': 34, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1885, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1627, 'last_played': 1567975750}
review:
Me gusta, es un juego RPG de aventura que conozco desde su versión web y he llegado a jugar las 4 sagas de la serie EBF a excepción de sus spin-offs.

El juego es bastante bueno y entretenido. La música es maravillosa y la jugabilidad está muy bien hecha. Las habilidades y hechizos son geniales. los objetos y el diseño de los equipamientos son variados. El arte de fondo y de las cinemáticas es muy lindo y el diseño de los enemigos es original. El juego te ofrece la libertad de explorar el mundo y descubrir todos sus secretos, además está lleno de referencias a videojuegos y anime.

No es perfecto, la trama puede ser divertida, pero no es la mejor del mundo y carece de un buen desarrollo de personajes por lo que difícilmente puedes encariñarte con los protagonistas, aunque no por eso deja de ser una historia interesante y entretenida. El humor está presente en todas las líneas de dialogo de los personajes y sin duda te sacara más de una risa.[

También tiene muchos logros, estos no influyen en la jugabilidad, pero te motivan a continuar con la aventura y pondrán aprueba tus habilidades como jugador, los jefes pueden representar un verdadero desafío dependiendo de la dificultad.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009486712', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1598, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1598, 'last_played': 1533013194}
review:
I'm not into indie stuff really, but this is actually a surprisingly amusing game. 

It's no secret that the story is a bit weak, but the story that's there I actually enjoyed. The combat mechanics were really fun, outside of the way the 4th player is implemented... I found that a bit awkward, and spent most of the game ignoring one party member. It was playable that way, but I'd have prefered an easy way to use everyone without constant member swaps. 

Still. I definitely had good fun for my dollar on this. I think the one before this in the series is free (or used to be, at least). The game changed up a bit between this and that, but check out the free one if you're unsure. I suspect you'll enjoy it enough you'll want to grab this one after.

5 is coming out shortly now, and I'm totally ready for it too.

review: Having played this game when it first came out as a free flash game online years ago, I was unsure if I should pay $12 for this.  After purchasing it, I was blown away all over again. The combination of all the premium content being included,  as well as the soundtrack as a free addon, made it one of the best purchases I've made on Steam. The writing is absolutely hilarious, the graphics and environments are stunning, and the music is in a league of it's own. If you're unsure whether to buy this, give the third game a try. It's free on Steam, and this game only adds to the greatness of the third.

author: {'steamid': '76561198080267493', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 2826, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1301, 'last_played': 1533694870}
review:
Epic Battle Fantasy 4 takes what was great about 3, brings it over and pretties it up, then adds in even more great content. It's another worthy sequel in a fine indie series, and I would happily recommend the new one to anyone - even the paid version.

If you missed the others in the series, Epic Battle Fantasy is a JRPG series in the vein of the old Final Fantasies, but with much more streamlined gameplay, a flash graphics systems, and dialogue that will keep you coming back for the laughs. Changes-wise from the other games, you gain access to quite a few spells that the players normally only gained through items, you get a fourth character (that unfortunately needs to tag in with one of the other three), and the story/areas are somewhat longer. There are many more secrets, enemies, and limit breakers, and it all works great.

The game, even though it doesn't keep the music from the last one, still keeps many of the elements: art style is still the same anime-esque (there's a fun word to use at parties) one, and characters return. The script is hilarious all around, and is not afraid of taking shots at other series, or even itself.

EBF4 is a worthy sequel to the series, adding onto the already great portions of the series with new and expansive content. It has secrets galore, and generally great quality for such a small budget series. Support the little guy! 9/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198297929701', 'num_games_owned': 445, 'num_reviews': 120, 'playtime_forever': 2727, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1776, 'last_played': 1610983646}
review:
相比较第三代，第四代更成熟了，更像是一个能放在架上大大方方卖钱的“制品版”游戏了。

这系列、这游戏，太惹人喜爱了！

人物与故事依旧同三代那般轻松而逗趣；四人组的整个冒险，就同标题那个夸张到显然是在搞笑的“epic battle”一样是一段热闹轻松的旅程。战斗方面，依旧是最正统最古老的轮换式回合指令制。普通难度下有点儿无聊，只有在epic级难度下才能体现出战斗系统设计的精华。相生相克各处各件无一多余的招式技能配置，斤斤计较多一分即多少一分即少的属性数值设定，使人时常感觉这玩的是SRPG（话说，没有地图探索与剧情、只有战斗的一代与二代好像真可以说是SRPG耶……）。据说五代现正在开发中。简、直、让、人、心焦难耐！

author: {'steamid': '76561198042586930', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 123, 'playtime_forever': 6, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1531883519}
review:
Game's highest resolution is < 1080p.  Enough said.  It also runs very jittery/laggy which is ludicrous given my specs and other games which run fine.  I got about 15 minutes into it, and it broke the 4th wall like 5 times already.  I get it, geezus.  You're self-aware.  Also there's no voice acting at all from what I could tell, so you might as well sit down and read a book for 20 some-odd hours that it advertises.  

I do not recommend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198113881719', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 1198, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 803, 'last_played': 1504803518}
review:
Epic Battle Fantasy 4

Overview
This game is simply a parody of JRPG plots. It represents the unoriginal fan-service, defeat the bad guys using characters that are flawed and often a nuisance. Nonetheless, it was enjoyable. I played the game on hard until the very end when I faced the final bosses; had to turn it off due to the ridiculous one-shots that were happening. I surmise that too is reminiscent of JRPG’s that have ridiculous spikes when you play in hard mode.

I further want to give appreciation for references to well-liked anime characters. As mentioned at the end of the story, characters needed further development in order to get an idea of their backgrounds BUT, this is exactly what the developers wanted to highlight. 

Overall, the game is enjoyable. Lemme just check how much I paid for it to see if the price was right…..
I got it on sale when it was $3.95. The $12.00 that they are asking for is ridiculously high for what the game offers, I would recommend the purchase if it is on sale.

Happy playing
MoonlightQuerida

author: {'steamid': '76561198382117001', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 2134, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 562, 'last_played': 1610698745}
review:
Epic Battle Fantasy 4

La Suite directe d'Epic Battle Fantasy 3 où on découvre un nouveau personnage jouable, l'archère Anna!
Comme le précédent opus, il s'agit d'un RPG classique à l'humour omniprésent, que ce soit dant le chara-design, les dialogues, les succès steam (oui, moi aussi j'ai molesté un poulet ou même plusieurs, dans ce jeu) ou l'histoire elle-même.
Jouable au clavier et à la souris, ou à la souris uniquement (merci!!!!!), disponible en Français, Anglais, Allemand, Espagnol ou Portugais du Brésil. Et, de plus, la musique est encore meilleure que dans le précédent... mais il est pas gratuit...
Je recommande car il est encore meilleur que le 3.

author: {'steamid': '76561198293315106', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 3209, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3209, 'last_played': 1531206509}
review:
일단 게임성이 좋다. 턴제 알피지 감성이 살아있다고 해두면 될것같다.
1회차까지 아주 재밌게 플레이했다. 다회차 플레이를 제공하는데 도전과제 완료에 필요하다. 도전과제 때문에 붙잡고 있어 그런가.. 그 이후에는 플레이하기 좀 힘들었다...
도전과제에 큰 신경쓰지 않을거라면 의외로 캐주얼하게 즐길수 있는 게임이다. 반대로 말하면 파고들어볼 요소가 상당히 있다.
속편도 제작중이고 꽤나 완성된듯 한데 4편은 세일할때 사서 해보면 좋을것 같다. 추천함!

author: {'steamid': '76561198080596499', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 5775, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4920, 'last_played': 1710357767}
review:
10/10 ~~ I find myself coming back to this game way too often.

Fantastic game, with challenging encounters and great replayability to try all sorts of silly builds, plus the dialog does not get old (mostly because there is so much of it, you are unlikely to remember all of them in the first 100 runs), for this alone I think most JRPG fans will be more than pleased.

Another great thing about this game is the soundtrack, they are all made by Phyrnna a literal angel of music, you can check the song "Under My Skin" or my personal favorite "Wings" if you don't believe me.

The Con I have is that once you learn resurrection management the "New Game Plus" and "New Game PlusPlus" loses its edge because playing the optimal build gets mechanical. So unless you are into speed runs playing for massive pwnege is only exciting once.

author: {'steamid': '76561198188664927', 'num_games_owned': 1605, 'num_reviews': 386, 'playtime_forever': 2005, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2005, 'last_played': 1486409571}
review:
[h1] Game Summary: [/h1] 
Starting off, for any who might have reservations about trying this game out, you can always play the game before this one, Epic Battle Fantasy 3, for free on Steam.  It's like playing a demo, but better.  Earlier titles than that can be found on game-hosting websites, where this series all started out in the first place.  It's been years since I've played them, but from what I can recall, the earlier games play pretty similarly to this one.  I suppose that'd be for you to determine if that's good or bad, but I've found enjoyment from them.  


[h1] Pros: [/h1] 
•	Considering the basic graphics for the game, there's a urprising amount of content and playtime.  I'm very surprised I've played this for more than 30 hours.  I'd also admit that the same can be said for the difficulty, as this game will chew you up and spit you out, if you try the hardest difficulty unprepared.
•	The game makes references and utilizes elements from popular RPGs.  The Final Fantasy limit break is a simple example.  Pulling in various ideas and throwing them together won't always work out, but it blends together well in this game.  
•	The game has a wide assortment of equipment to level up, all of which grant specific effects and benefits.  Characters also have several spells and special abilities to unlock and level up, granting a decent degree of customization.  
•	I appreciate the light-hearted, none too serious tone.  Whether you LOL or not is another matter.
•	Included with the main story mode are enemy and boss rush modes.


[h1] Cons: [/h1] 
•	One thing I dislike about leveling up the abilities and skills is that the game is designed so that many of these can be applied to more than one character, but only one character can learn it.  It makes balancing your party more time-consuming and cumbersome, when that's already quite the task.  The customization is nice, but each character being pre-designed and balanced would have resolved this.  It would be less flexible, but since each character has their own style and motif, I think it'd be more fitting overall.
•	There's a considerable amount of equipment shuffling necessary with all the various elements, enemy types, and weaknesses in order to maximize damage and ensure you aren't killed off easily.  This isn't as necessary on easier difficulties and when battling weaklings, but changing out your equipment frequently is essential on higher difficulties and for boss fights.
•	Since the story-line added an additional character, increasing the party from three to four, it'd have been nice to fight with four people instead of only three.  The game would have to be rebalanced completely, but it'd have been a nice upgrade from the previous games.  
•	The game is designed with the mindset that you would play through the entire game three times.  This seems like overkill to me, especially since nothing significant changes with subsequent playthroughs.


[h1] Conclusion: [/h1] 
Frankly, there's too much well-made content in the game, with signs that a significant amount of effort was put into the process, for me to dislike this game.  I do think it suffers from some unfortunate design choices, but there's no fatal flaws that ruin the experience, only make it less than ideal.  These mainly revolve around increasing the time needed to do things, such as having to swap equipment around to deal with a specific enemy type from one battle to the next.  The fifth game in the series has been released, and it seems like a worthwhile sequel to this title.  Eventually I'll get around to it, and I'm hoping it'll be just as epic as this one, if not more so.

review: El juego me encanto, primero lo había jugado en Kongregate (Donde jugué a varios juegos que me encantan y quiero o compre en Steam) Gracias a este juego conocí la saga, entonces cuando conseguí Steam y empecé a cargarle plata lo compre, bueno, este juego cuando lo conocí todavía ni siquiera estaba en desarrollo el EBF5, cuando empecé el desarrollo del EBF5 comenzó yo y un amigo nos emocionamos mucho (El juego lo jugábamos los dos, yo usaba a Anna y Natalie y el a Matt y Lance) entonces esperamos, y esperamos, y esperamos, y cuando ya estaba al 99% completo y estaba casi listo, yo estaba muy feliz, además tenía el 20% por tener el EBF4 y bueno, dos o tres días después de que saliera lo compre.

author: {'steamid': '76561198331126137', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 2617, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2061, 'last_played': 1558886141}
review:
Ich liebe dieses Spiel, da es für mich Nostalgiefaktor hat. Ich habe es als ich noch in der Mittelstufe war sehr gesuchtet und dann, da es auf dem PC meines Vaters war, aus den Augen verloren. Ich habe mich gefreut, wie ein kleines Kind an Weihnachten, als ich es hier wiederentdeckt habe.
Das Spiel besticht durch seinen Witz, die Story und die Taktik die man beim kämpfen gegen Monster einsetzten muss und erinnert dabei ein wenig an andere RPG's. Zusätzlich zu der Story gibt es noch weitere Quests und Zusatzbereiche, die man freispielen und dann durchspielen kann, was das Spiel auch über längere Zeit noch spannend und fordernd macht.
Ich würde es Menschen empfehlen, die im allgemeinen RPG´s mögen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198353384414', 'num_games_owned': 253, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 2743, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2718, 'last_played': 1663857253}
review:
9.0/10.0
麻雀虽小，五脏俱全。
曾经在那种在线小游戏网站上玩过，品质惊为天人。在steam上重遇时，已经多了一系列的多周目要素了。身为一款典型的RPG，人物形象、技能、装备、成就、多周目挑战、隐藏要素、精致的音乐、适度的解谜……可能唯一的缺陷就是剧情还不够好。但一款200M不到的游戏，已经把上述其他因素都做得这么好了，还想怎样？！
当没心思或没那个机器配置去享受各类RPG大作时，Epic Battle Fantasy 4 绝对是一道精致的甜点。

author: {'steamid': '76561197996568862', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 12, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1527212767}
review: This game clearly was never meant to be a retail release.  It starts out with no tutorial and drops you into a screen with four characters and no direction.  You'll learn which is yours fairly quickly when you click somewhere and one moves, but the game explains itself poorly enough that I found the bonus challenge zone before I found the main story.  It also has a horrible menu system that displays a lot of things in a poorly organized manner and won't tell you what your equiment's stats do.  In addition to this the menus didn't even seem to be consistent, with me finding permanent stat buff items in the consumables folder instead of the permanent stat buff item folder.  As far as combat goes, I couldn't say as I quit before I reached any.  If I were to say anything positive, it would be that the music seemed like it might be decent if I spent more time on the game, but I don't plan to.

author: {'steamid': '76561198121531413', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 3252, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3192, 'last_played': 1524116048}
review:
全成就评测。
RPG的一大乐趣在于：调整你团队的装备搭配，有针对性地战胜原来遥不可及的敌人。不是指战胜那一瞬间的征服感，不是指刷刷刷而提升面板的成就感，单纯只在于调整搭配本身，思考如何更好的针对敌人的过程本身。
这个Flash很好的给了我这样的乐趣。

author: {'steamid': '76561198054048330', 'num_games_owned': 2263, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 1644, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1644, 'last_played': 1526102133}
review:
A surprisongly great RPG experience. EBF4 offers a satisfying JRPG experience that should be accessible to most players. Design choices are all logical and the game progresses quickly enough to keep you engaged. 

Developing your charecters is done in two main ways, upgrading skills and equipment. Both tasks are easy to understand and getting yourself geared up for battles/dungeons is never a chore.

The graphics are very colourful and other than an occasional adult bewb joke, the whole experience is pretty kid friendly. I was put off slightly by the charecter design of humans, which looks a little cheap to me, but once I got over this I had an absolute blast.

author: {'steamid': '76561198087343874', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1091, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1091, 'last_played': 1522081695}
review:
You can explore intricately crafted map in search of treasures. You can play it casually with disregard to any expectations it has for you.  You can beset NPCs for their stories or side quests. You can master it and complete all the challenges. Or you can sit in front of a clickable object, switch your party members and laugh as they crack jokes and generally have fun, as I did. But no matter what your approach is, Epic Battle Fantasy 4 is cute and fun game you can play to unwind after a long day.

Aside from perfectly balanced fighting system or challenging difficulty curve (starts easy, gets harder), or even the exploration, or unlocking new gear, the biggest asset it can offer is pure fun and atmosphere of the childhood times when [b]You[/b] spent all your days outside with your friends throwing fireballs, fighting dragons or capturing enemy bases. And coming home after all this fun with not a single care in the world. 

Ok, let's get to some serious reviewing. EBF4 is rather simple game with much depth to it. Let’s see to the most prominent aspects of the game.

[h1]The fighting system[/h1]
Molded into a fashion of a JRPGs (if you are not familiar with this term, think of games like Final Fantasy VII or, my personal favorite, Child of Light; if this still does not ring any bells, think of a game where fighters stand in two rows facing each other and take actions in turns, but do not change their position), fights base on very simple principle of being resistant to certain attacks and susceptible to others. It is player’s task to figure out what attack suits best. Fights get progressively harder as enemies and characters unlock new skills and gear. Nature of every opponent is indicated by its distinct look and behavior, so, even without scanning them with skill, it is fairly easy to figure out the tactics. 

[h1]The difficulty[/h1]
Perfectly balanced. At the beginning I was worried, that the game will not be challenging enough. But as the story progressed, I found myself looking for new tactics, testing most effective skills combination and buying items that would give me advantage in combat. At the end I even felt that the game is too hard. I did not kill the last boss, but that was rather because of the accumulation of real-life events, than its actual difficulty.

[h1]The story and the characters[/h1]
Story is rather simple, but it is only an excuse to present interactions between main heroes. With distinct personalities they are both likable and fit the game perfectly. All in all the game maintains the atmosphere of a pen-and-paper RPG session, with characters being aware they are inside the game, which adds another layer of meta-humor to their jokes. I must admit that I anticipated with restlessness every piece of dialog between fights. There are some lewd jokes but not even once do they cross the point of bad taste.

[h1]The World[/h1]
When I have first seen the map, my only thought was: wow, that’s small. But in fact it is incredibly well designed. It encourages exploring, there are secrets hidden all around and the right amount of back-tracking makes the game all the more so entertaining.

[h1]The art style[/h1]
Cutscenes are the cutest thing I have seen, maybe ever. The overall art style is pleasing and coherent.

Ok, that’s it for this review. If you don’t feel convinced, let me tell you one last thing. You can click on boobs. We need that in more games :P

author: {'steamid': '76561198141655958', 'num_games_owned': 250, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 1190, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1143, 'last_played': 1526904802}
review:
Un maravilloso juego de nuestro querido Matt Roszak, jugue la versión gratuita en su momento y no llegue a acabar el juego (guarde una nueva partida encima sin querer) y he disfrutado cada minuto de juego. Combate por turnos con una gran cantidad de habilidades, armas y trajes; una historia que, si es cierto que no brilla por ser espectacular, pero que no se hace pesada ni aburrida. Personajes muy carismaticos, tanto los protagonistas Matt y Natalie como nuestro amado Lance que se nos une en EBF3 y nuestra nueva compañera Anna. 
Te reiras con cada referencia y pullas al mundo y las roturas de la 4a pared que hacen los NPC (recomendadisimo leer cada una de las conversaciones). Muy recomendado

author: {'steamid': '76561198207069931', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 1433, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1432, 'last_played': 1709096034}
review: Like the 3rd game, but with a tree hugger. and Preatorian ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

author: {'steamid': '76561198261171187', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 2681, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1747, 'last_played': 1541733167}
review:
For a game that makes fun of itself and has a ton of references and little easter eggs to other, more popular games and series, I would highly recommend this game because of how much honest fun there is to have. You can customize your party by giving certain skills to one character, and the amount of strategy you can find in what could otherwise be simple cookie-cutter battles is fascinating.

I was already a fan of Matt Rozniks work from playing both of his major epic battle fantasy games (as well as his bullet hell series), and I'm glad that I got to support his work by purchasing this game on steam.

author: {'steamid': '76561197960868941', 'num_games_owned': 314, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 5500, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5166, 'last_played': 1524856607}
review:
This game is a great way to relive traditional RPG gameplay.

You can pick it up, play for a few hours, put it down for a week and come back to it still knowing what's happening and where you are headed next.

The encounters are challenging later in the game and that forces you to think before simply attacking. 

I've sunk many hours into this game and I feel like it's been well worth the time investment.

author: {'steamid': '76561198324914664', 'num_games_owned': 113, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 4774, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4068, 'last_played': 1564801374}
review: I remeber the time i've spend playing these EBF games on flash and loved to see the newest one on steam. Ive this game through 3 sepreate times and enjoyed the secrets and new areas i had not found in other play throughs. I loved the characters and the humor, if your a master or novel to RPG style games i totally recommend to you as a great openning or just for a good time. i have to say, play the other 3 games first, all of them including this one are free on many flash game websites. many jokes and story telling rely on prevous games to tell it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198005553914', 'num_games_owned': 2703, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 2096, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1855, 'last_played': 1558984200}

author: {'steamid': '76561198137974703', 'num_games_owned': 454, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 1829, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1074, 'last_played': 1638892545}
review:
I've been a fan of the series since I discovered EBF3  a few years ago. And while that part was great this game has improved alot on that foundation.  After I played through the free version (avaible on most gaming websites and easy to find) I figured it was time to buy the game and support the creator. 
Core of the game is clearly the combat system, which allows many strategies thanks to the amount of learn-/findable skills and the elemental system. 
The bonus content (additional area called battle mountain which allows fighting stronger versions of the campaigns bosses and even new bosses, while also providing new equipment) that is exclusive to the steam release is nice and offers a lot of fun and more experimentation with the fighting system, but the NG+ really feels to add more. While on your first playthrough you are handicapped in the way that you always need a specific skillset and have to focus your resources on getting it, on your second and third playthrough you are free to use advanced combos or experiment, while enemies continue being a challenge thanks to being scaled to your level.

review: This is a game every Rpg fan needs to try out, Even own. I've finished it quite alot before it came to steam. The music is amazing, The characters are hilarious and the story is rich.

author: {'steamid': '76561198081461391', 'num_games_owned': 275, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 2891, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2569, 'last_played': 1546352923}
review:
Игра выше всяких похвал, на мой взгляд одна из самых лучших игр жанра JRPG.
Хороший сюжет (Хоть и линейный), юмор и отсылки к другим вселенным присутствует, что добавляет интереса (русский язык не завезли, поэтому поймёт не каждый)
Большой выбор экипировки и спелов.
В общем, рекомендую!

author: {'steamid': '76561198386918250', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 1191, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1187, 'last_played': 1566490378}
review:
한국어가 아닌 게 아쉽다면 아쉽지만, 번역기를 써가며 상당히 재밌게 플레이했습니다.
퍼즐이 미묘하게;; 어려운 편이지만, 그래도 만점을 주기에 아깝지 않은 게임이었습니다.
물론 처음하는 사람들은 어려울 가능성이 높습니다. 이건 확실히 어렵거든요;
한국어 번역해주실 분이 있다면 좀 더 많은 사람들이 할 수 있을텐데... 하는 게 아쉬움으로 남습니다.
현재 시즌 5가 제작중입니다, 자신에게 영어 실력이 있다면 이건 전투만 재밌는 게임이 아니란 걸 느낄 수 있을겁니다.



ps. 누가 번역 좀 해줘요. 후원 약간 해드릴게요.
